Key Match Events: N'Golo Kante and Marcus Thuram were denied by fine saves from goalkeeper Maxime Crepeau
Kylian Mbapp√© came off the bench in the 74th minute and was close to scoring in the last play of the match
Olivier Giroud received a standing ovation at the Nouveau Stade de Bordeaux
Post-Match Reflections: Manager Didier Deschamps stated it's not ideal but important to spread the play around and get everyone involved
Deschamps added they'll make the most of the experience in terms of what awaits them on June 17
Miscellaneous Highlights: France comfortably beat Luxembourg 3-0 on Wednesday
France face Austria in their tournament opener before taking on the Netherlands on June 21 and Poland four days later
Canada will kick off the Copa America against Lionel Messi's Argentina on June 20, before facing Peru five days later and Chile on June 29
